content: this legal text is about a court case that took place in parma on august 1 2016 the case is identified as number 996 it involves a legal case about compensation but unfortunately the text does not provide any further information about the parties involved or the details of the case the court has made a final decision and ordered the dissolution of the community property between the parties the plaintiff has been assigned a specific property while the defendant df has been assigned another property the defendant dc has also been assigned a property excluding a certain strip of land df has been ordered to pay the plaintiff €450000 and dc to pay the plaintiff €80000 plus any additional costs determined by an experts report the plaintiff has also been ordered to pay the defendant c €243100 plus any statutory fees both parties are responsible for the costs of the experts report the courts decision was made on july 26 2016 in parma
